languages.text: {n}А вот Серый Вортен бросает на вас заинтересованный взгляд. Стоит вам поймать его, как пьянящий запах свежей крови ударяет в ноздри, а предсмертные вопли и звуки рвущейся плоти оглушительной симфонией застилают уши. Вот он, источник скверны, крепко вцепившийся в душу Винтерскейла.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey casts a curious look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and the sound of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. This is it, the source of the corruption that has taken hold of Winterscale's soul.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}А вот Серый Вортен бросает на вас заинтересованный взгляд. Стоит вам поймать его, как пьянящий запах свежей крови ударяет в ноздри, а предсмертные вопли и звуки рвущейся плоти оглушительной симфонией застилают уши. Вот он, источник скверны, крепко вцепившийся в душу Винтерскейла.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten the Grey throws you an interested glance. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and sounds of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. Here is the source of the filth wound tight about Winterscale's soul.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey throws you an interested glance. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and sounds of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. Here is the source of the filth wound tight about Winterscale's soul.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey casts an interested look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and sounds of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. Here is the source of the filth wound tight about Winterscale's soul.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey casts an interested look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and sounds of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. Here is the source of the filth wound tight about Winterscale's soul.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey casts a curious look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and the sound of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. This is it, the source of the corruption that has taken hold of Winterscale's soul.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey casts a curious look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and the sound of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. This is it, the source of the corruption that has taken hold of Winterscale's soul.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten el Gris te mira con curiosidad. Nada más percatarte de ello, el olor embriagador de la sangre llena tus fosas nasales y resuenan en tus oídos los gritos de los moribundos y el sonido de la carne desgarrándose. Ahí está, es el origen de la corrupción que atenaza el alma de Winterscale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey casts a curious look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and the sound of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. This is it, the source of the corruption that has taken hold of Winterscale's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten el Gris te mira con interés. Nada más percatarte de ello, el olor embriagador de la sangre llena tus fosas nasales y resuenan en tus oídos los gritos de los moribundos y el sonido de la carne desgarrándose. Tienes ante ti el origen de la corrupción que atenaza el alma de Winterscale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}灰斑沃尔腾饶有兴趣地看着你。当你注意到他时，一股令人兴奋的血腥味扑鼻而来，你听到死亡的呼喊和血肉的撕裂声。没错，就是它，这就是盘踞在温特斯凯尔灵魂中的腐化之源。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey casts a curious look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and the sound of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. This is it, the source of the corruption that has taken hold of Winterscale's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}灰斑沃尔腾饶有兴趣地看着你。当你注意到他时，一股令人兴奋的血腥味扑鼻而来，你听到死亡的呼喊和血肉的撕裂声。这就是紧紧缠绕在温特斯凯尔灵魂上的污秽之源。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten le Gris vous lance un regard intéressé. Dès que vous vous en rendez compte, l'odeur capiteuse du sang emplit vos narines, tandis que des hurlements d'agonie et des sons de chair que l'on déchire assaillent vos oreilles. Voilà la source de la corruption qui enserre l'âme de Winterscale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey casts a curious look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and the sound of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. This is it, the source of the corruption that has taken hold of Winterscale's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten le Gris vous lance un regard intéressé. Dès que vous vous en rendez compte, l'odeur capiteuse du sang emplit vos narines, tandis que des hurlements d'agonie et des sons de chair que l'on déchire assaillent vos oreilles. Voilà la source du mal qui enserre l'âme de Winterscale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイが興味深そうにこちらを見ている。あなたが気づくやいなや、血の臭いが鼻孔を刺激し、死の叫び声と肉を引き裂く音があなたの耳を襲う。それこそが、ウィンタースケールの魂を堕落させた元凶なのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey casts a curious look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and the sound of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. This is it, the source of the corruption that has taken hold of Winterscale's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイが興味深そうにこちらを見ている。あなたが気づくやいなや、血の臭いが鼻孔を刺激し、死の叫び声と肉を引き裂く音があなたの耳を襲う。それこそが、ウィンタースケールの魂を堕落させた元凶なのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten der Graue mustert dich mit einem interessierten Blick. Sobald du es bemerkst, strömt der schwere Geruch von Blut in deine Nase, und deine Ohren werden von Todesschreien und dem Geräusch von reißendem Fleisch angegriffen. Das ist sie, die Quelle der Verderbnis, die Besitz von Winterzunders Seele ergriffen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey casts a curious look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and the sound of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. This is it, the source of the corruption that has taken hold of Winterscale's soul.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten der Graue mustert dich mit einem interessierten Blick. Sobald du es bemerkst, strömt der schwere Geruch von Blut in deine Nase, und deine Ohren werden von Todesschreien und dem Geräusch von reißendem Fleisch angegriffen. Hier ist die Quelle der schmutzigen Wunde, die sich so eng um Winterzunders Seele gewunden hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gri Worten sana kuşkulu bir bakış atıyor. Bakışı fark etmenle birlikte burnuna kanın sert kokusu çarpıyor. Beraberinde ölüm çığlıkları ve parçalanan etlerin sesi, kulaklarına hücum ediyor. İşte bu, Winterscale'in ruhuna yerleşen yozlaşmanın kaynağı karşında.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey casts a curious look at you. As soon as you notice, the heady smell of blood hits your nostrils, accompanied by death cries and the sound of tearing flesh assaulting your ears. This is it, the source of the corruption that has taken hold of Winterscale's soul.{/n}
